content: Investments REITs ETF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 May 2019What are your views on REITS ETF? 2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 09 May 2019Don't get into a reit etf. You pay more in terms of ongoing management fees and the yield is lower. As Luke mentioned you can just DIY0 comments0

Luke Ho, Money Maverick at Money MaverickLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019A couple of people have suggested that REIT ETFs are too expensive considering the alternative - you could put it together and have it cheaper than under the ETF itself.I usually don't advocate DIY, but you could literally put it together cheaper (Depending on your capital). You could completely copy the ETF structure which is right there - it's completely transparent.2 comments0

Question Poster09 May 2019What about buying Nikko AM-Straits Trading ex-Japan REIT ETF via RSS?Gabriel Tham09 May 2019Overseas REITs dont enjoy the same tax treatment as SG REITs hence the yield from overseas REITs will be compressed too resulting in an overall lower yield.
